title: Rust Compiler error on building rust-http
body:
Ubuntu 14.04 64 bit, built rust from repo today, then tried to build rust-http

Resulting dump is from make all RUST_BACKTRACE=1

```
$ mkdir -p build/
$ rustc src/codegen/main.rs --out-dir=build
error: internal compiler error: unexpected failure
note: the compiler hit an unexpected failure path. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
task 'rustc' failed at 'No triple in crate', /home/richard/rust/src/libstd/option.rs:245
stack backtrace:
   1:     0x2b54f6654e70 - rt::backtrace::imp::write::h78772030605f8861owa::v0.11.pre
   2:     0x2b54f65b47d0 - rt::unwind::begin_unwind_inner::h36f991db566a6096t69::v0.11.pre
   3:     0x2b54f3d21470 - rt::unwind::begin_unwind::h17006656765415657702::v0.11.pre
   4:     0x2b54f44a90e0 - metadata::decoder::get_crate_triple::h4b4e72c013525b45dPb::v0.11.pre
   5:     0x2b54f44c28d0 - metadata::loader::Context<'a>::extract_one::h4d03615d97b78d1599d::v0.11.pre
   6:     0x2b54f44bb820 - metadata::loader::Context<'a>::find_library_crate::h8dfaed6ac5000862sDd::v0.11.pre
   7:     0x2b54f44b7a90 - metadata::loader::Context<'a>::load_library_crate::h173b03445bde29eeQpd::v0.11.pre
   8:     0x2b54f44b33f0 - metadata::creader::resolve_crate::h866fb1f2ae5ce758Oqc::v0.11.pre
   9:     0x2b54f44ac5e0 - metadata::creader::Env<'a>.visit..Visitor<(*>::visit_view_item::hd87447825ec8caf55Zb::v0.11.pre
  10:     0x2b54f44ab810 - metadata::creader::read_crates::h2e623903ccaf4fe5cZb::v0.11.pre
  11:     0x2b54f4108f30 - util::common::time::h12594187007724489660::v0.11.pre
  12:     0x2b54f4545720 - driver::driver::phase_3_run_analysis_passes::heac07af4054c03cdTCf::v0.11.pre
  13:     0x2b54f454b630 - driver::driver::compile_input::h80d7e3bc1052a9d3G2f::v0.11.pre
  14:     0x2b54f4570290 - run_compiler::h154eefd6dcf881cdxzn::v0.11.pre
  15:     0x2b54f4588110 - main_args::closure.91435
  16:     0x2b54f4586610 - monitor::closure.91310
  17:     0x2b54f4581f00 - task::TaskBuilder::try::closure.91076

  19:     0x2b54f664feb0 - rt::task::Task::run::closure.40113

  21:     0x2b54f664fcf0 - rt::task::Task::run::he684d2e5ffd32f1cwW7::v0.11.pre
  22:     0x2b54f6328760 - task::spawn_opts::closure.7084
  23:     0x2b54f66539b0 - rt::thread::thread_start::h996968b4f813e177JB8::v0.11.pre

make: *** [build/codegen] Error 101
```
